Function.Description: The text function converts a numeric value into a Text or String in a specified numeric format.

Brief.Overview: The text function converts a numeric value into a Text or String in a specified numeric format.
Brief.Usage: The text function is used to coerce a value into a String or Text using a specified numeric format.

Argument.Name: value
Argument.Note: Any number that evaluates to a number

Argument.Name: format
Argument.Note: A format code for representing a number as a String; for example: "##.#0" or "$#,###.#0".
